item.title: Tineco Pure One Station 5 Review (2025): This Vac Empties Itself
item.description: The freestanding charging and emptying station makes this cordless vacuum feel almost like a robot vacuum—except you still do the vacuuming.

item.title: Corsair K70 Pro TKL Review: Pro Isn’t Always Better
item.description: Corsair’s latest Pro keyboard cuts corners by mixing Hall effect and mechanical switches to create a confusing mess.

item.title: Corsair Void Wireless v2 Review: Dolby Atmos on Bigger Heads
item.description: These updated gaming headphones fit larger noggins and have Dolby Atmos.

item.title: Factor Delivery Meals Review (2025): Tender Salmon, Room to Grow
item.description: Factor home-delivery meals have mastered the art of a juicy, medium-rare steak. But inconsistency is still an issue.

item.title: What Are the Best Coffee Beans for Cold Brew?
item.description: Cold brew demands different beans than drip or espresso to come out right. Here’s a guide to finding the right ones.
